goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there is a white and soft object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.3: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
rules.4: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
